ou read this - you once said you didn't think people here would make threat=
s to me. You can see this one is.=C2=A0 And yet it is me Frank threatens wi=
th banning, and does nothing about actual physical attack threats from his =
members.

 our names ???? How many people are there ??? and what color is the shirt I=
'm wearing ????? That Box works,I dont know how but it works,and I believe =
if your not careful you can get EVIL to come out...Get off Franks back...Or=
 I'll find you and you dont want that...get with it or GET LOST...Thats my =
opion,let me know Frank and I'll take a road trip.I got laid off today and =
I'm in the mood to screw something or someone up !!!!!
